00019 #ifndef YS_SHIPPING_TYPE_H
00020 #define YS_SHIPPING_TYPE_H
00021 
00022 #include "xmlnode.h"
00023 #include "ys_build.h"
00024 #include <vector>
00025 #include <string>
00026 
00027 using namespace std;
00028 
00029 class YardDatabase;
00030 
00043 class YardShipType: public XMLNode
00044 {
00045  public:
00046    
00047     friend class YardDatabase;
00048 
00049     YardShipType(const string& xml): XMLNode(xml, Str) {}    
00050     YardShipType(): XMLNode() { setName("Shipping_Table"); }
00051     
00052     const char * GetUnique() const { return "SHP_Type"; }
00053     /* gettors */
00054 
00056     string GetShipType() const 
00057     { return child("SHP_Type").data(); }
00059     string GetCarrierIdS() const
00060     { return child("SHP_REF_CRR_ID").data(); }
00061     long GetCarrierId() const 
00062     { return ToLong(GetCarrierIdS()); }
00064     string GetCostS() const
00065     { return child("SHP_Cost").data(); }
00066     double GetCost() const 
00067     { return ToDouble(GetCostS()); }
00069     bool GetEnabled() const 
00070     { return (GetEnabledS() == "0") ? false : true; }
00071     string GetEnabledS() const 
00072     { return child("SHP_Enabled").data(); }
00073 
00074     /* settors */
00075 
00077     void SetShipType(const string& str) 
00078     { child("SHP_Type").setData(str); }
00080     void SetCarrierID(long num) 
00081     { child("SHP_REF_CRR_ID").setData(ToStr(num)); }
00083     void SetCost(double num) 
00084     { child("SHP_Cost").setData(ToStr(num, YS_DEFAULT_MONEY_PRECISION)); }
00086     void SetEnabled(bool flag) 
00087     { (flag) ? child("SHP_Enabled").setData("1") : child("SHP_Enabled").setData("0"); }
00088 
00089     virtual string ToString(const string& delim = ",") const;
00090 
00091 };
00092 
00093 #endif
